container
about text
About us
Make Every Celebration Unforgettable
Welcome to The Food Factory, your go-to venue for hosting any event in the heart of Oviedo on the Park. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering, a birthday bash, a corporate meeting, or a special celebration, our unique setting ensures an experience your guests will talk about for years to come.
Our collection of micro-restaurants offers diverse and delectable options that cater to every taste, making your event a culinary journey. From authentic Mexican flavors at The 1 Cantina to the savory delights of The Local Hen, the gourmet pizzas of Buttercrust Pizza, and the innovative Asian street fare of Kai, your event's menu can be as varied and exciting as you wish.
about text end

about video end

About Us
Our Story and Vision
Home
About Us
banner end
container
about text
ABOUT US
The Food Factory Story and Vision
Crafting Culinary Experiences in the Heart of Oviedo
Welcome to The Food Factory, not just a place to eat, but a community hub nestled in the vibrant Oviedo on the Park. Our story begins with a vision to create a unique dining destination that celebrates the diversity of flavors, cultures, and culinary talents. We're more than a collection of restaurants; we're a gathering place where families, friends, and food lovers can come together to share meals and create memories.
Visit us at The Food Factory and experience the joy of shared meals and the warmth of community dining.
about text end
about video
about video end
container end
container
Our Mission
To offer an unparalleled dining experience by hosting a diverse array of micro-restaurants under one roof, each bringing its own unique flavor and flair to the table. We aim to support local chefs and entrepreneurs, providing a platform for them to showcase their culinary creations to the wider community.
Our Community
At The Food Factory, community comes first. We are committed to creating a welcoming, inclusive atmosphere where every guest feels at home. Our location in Oviedo on the Park underscores our dedication to being an integral part of the local fabric, contributing to the area's vibrancy and charm.
Our Culinary Philosophy
Quality, creativity, and diversity drive our culinary philosophy. From authentic Mexican cuisine and Asian street fare to Southern comfort food and artisanal pizzas, our micro-restaurants cater to a wide range of tastes and dietary preferences. We believe in using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to craft dishes that delight the senses and nourish the soul.
Looking Ahead
As we look to the future, The Food Factory is excited to continue expanding our culinary offerings, hosting events, and strengthening our ties to the Oviedo community. We're not just building a food destination; we're fostering a space where culture, cuisine, and community meet.
container end
